description: Corruption of Ancient Greek ὠκυτόκος (ōkutókos), based on ὀξύς (oxús, “pointed”) instead of ὠκύς (ōkús, “swift”) + τόκος (tókos, “childbirth”).

adjectives.description: oxytocic (comparative more oxytocic, superlative most oxytocic)

entries.meaning: (medicine) Serving to promote uterine contractions, thus accelerating childbirth.
